jobDescription: TeamHealth has an excellent opportunity for a full-time Physician to join our Emergency Department practice at McLaren Bay Region in beautiful Bay City, Michigan - an easy commute from Flint, Grand Blanc, Clarkston, and the Saginaw areas. We are currently offering student loan payment at this facility for a limited time. The McLaren Bay Region hospital is part of McLaren Health, one of Michigan's largest and most innovative healthcare systems. The ED serves 47,000 patients annually and offers an easy-to-work-with medical staff and administration team. We provide 40 hours of Physician coverage, with 10-hour shifts and 36 hours of Advanced Practice Clinician coverage daily. Our efficient throughput system makes it easier on you. Lots of sub-specialty support at this Certified Stroke Center. We ask that you be Board Certified or Board Eligible in Emergency Medicine with current ACLS certification. We encourage Physicians that are Board Certified in Family Medicine or Internal Medicine with a minimum of 5 years of Emergency Medicine experience, as well as current ACLS, ATLS, and PALS certifications to apply.
